ygData.subject: OOC: Excellent Job!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just wanted to take this moment to say EXCELLENT JOB EVERYONE!! The posting has really stepped up and I like what I see. AIRLY: You are playing several

Subject: OOC: Excellent Job!
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=Zl3BOJEGtW3xbqDxZfmASgVSwFb1nBg4iXeKf7gzxxuY_8C5RyE2nw
X-Yahoo-Profile: supercyclonus

I just wanted to take this moment to say EXCELLENT JOB EVERYONE!!

The posting has really stepped up and I like what I see.

AIRLY: You are playing several really good characters and doing this
with a really chaotic real life and I really do appreciate your
efforts in this regard. I like your portrayals of Hydras and
Nightlight and I really look forward to seeing what will happen to
each of them. Nightlight is meeting meeting with Dark Rodimus and yet
unsure if he is Rodimus or something else, then there is Hydras who is
having to  react to all the changes that are happening with his staff
and the world around him. Great job so far on these accounts!

ADAM: I have really enjoyed your portrayal of Wheelie. He is the
aggravating type that we enjoy seeing interacting, just with somebody
else! (smile). And yet he still shows wisdom and intelligence behind
that acid tongue. I also appreciate your inner monologues from time to
time, they give me things to bounce off of. Also, you have just taken
on the roles of Dinobot, Vice Grip and Blackaracnia, and from what I
can they are excellent portrayals, each with thier own styles and
personalities. I can easily see that they are going to be vibrant
chaters.

SANDY: It may seem like I poke at you at times, but it is because I
see so much potential in you. You have a really good grasp of playing
multiple characters at once and yet keeping things going. You are a
prolific poster and you seem to be able to invest your characters with
so much vitality and energy. I also appreciate your flexability - If
something has to changed, you are readilly able to adjust and continue
on, that is the sign of a mature player. I always enjoy looking to see
what you will post next and bouncing off your posts.

So again: EXCELLENT JOB all around!

I shall be posting again really soon. This will be a busy weekend :)
But I will give Airly a chance to post for her characters first, and
then I look foward to another exciting chapter in NBWRPG!!!

- Preston
